full_summary:
================
### Government Tender Announcement

**Solicitation Number:** 24-58008

**Title:** Three (3) Cyclic Corrosion Chambers

**Reference Number:** CB-760-71260031

**Contracting Entity:** National Research Council Canada (NRC), Saguenay Site

**Trade Agreements:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and more.

**Procurement Details:**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Quebec (Excluding National Capital Region, NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (Excluding NCR)

**Contract Description:**

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites tenders for the procurement of up to three (3) cyclic corrosion chambers to support research and development (R&D) endeavors focused on environmental sustainability for the aluminum processing and surface technologies sector. The acquired equipment will be used to conduct accelerated environmental tests, following established standards, particularly those prevalent in the automotive industry.

**Scope of Work:**

The project's scope includes the procurement of cyclic corrosion chambers, along with necessary accessories meeting specified technical requirements, delivery, documentation, and training. The acquired equipment will be used to simulate diverse cyclic conditions, including salt fog or spray, saturated humidity, and controlled temperature conditions.

**Notice Information:**

* **Notice URL:** None
* **Attachment:** [1] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37345/24-58008_qa_three-%283-cyclic-corrosion-chambers---trois-%283-enceintes-cycliques-de-corrosion.pdf [2] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37345/24-58008_qa-2-_three-%283-cyclic-corrosion-chambers---trois-%283-enceintes-cycliques-de-corrosion.pdf [3] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37345/24-58008_npp_en_three-%283-cyclic-corrosion-chambers.pdf [4] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37345/24-58008_rfp
